l_glyph_getType Get Glyph Type

#### Description 

Query the type of a glyph

#### Usage
<pre><code>

l_glyph_getType(widget, id)

</code></pre>
#### Arguments 

* ``widget``: widget path as a string or as an object handle
* ``id ``:   glyph id

#### See Also
